data.title: Board Members & Management
data.meta_description: We are led by a strong and experienced team who are committed to taking DFM to greater
data.text:
We are led by a strong and experienced team who are committed to taking DFM to greater

DFM Board of Directors

By virtue of Article 20 of the Company’s Articles of Association, the DFM Board of Directors consists of 9 members.

Fatwa and Shari’a Supervisory Board

As a Shari’a compliant entity, DFM has a Supervisory Board consisting of leading Islamic scholars who bring tenure and subject matter expertise in legal, financial and banking-related matters.

DFM Management Team

We are led by a team of industry leaders and innovators who bring together decades of experience in financial markets and trading, setting high standards for the company.
